snippet.title: Kenshi - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
You are not the chosen one. You’re not great and powerful. You don’t have more ‘hit points’ than everyone else, and you are not special. Unless you work for it.

Buy it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/233860/Kenshi/

KENSHI is a single player sandbox PC game set in a vast and post-apocalyptic sword-punk style open world. With a mix of RPG elements, squad-based control and city-building features, gameplay is completely free-roaming and open: enjoy the freedom and potential to do whatever you want. Developed by Lo-Fi Games, the game will be leaving Early Access beta for it’s full 1.0 release. Compatible with Windows PC.

For more info: 
🡆https://lofigames.com/
🡆https://twitter.com/KenshiOfficial
🡆https://www.facebook.com/OfficialKenshi/
